item.title: Scaling Debate Is A Proxy Battle Over Centralization
item.description: I really appreciated the fact that…. I really appreciated Cory’s talk. I quoted someone in my talk. It was a fairly recent quote. His whole talk was speaking about governance. There’s a lot of governing issues coming into Bitcoin. We like the solving the whole world with technical. The word that I am fascinated with is the one highlighted here, the word “consensus”. I’m just going to reach out to you guys.
